name: S3 bucket {{bucketname.name}} is erroring at a high rate - DD Example
message:
Bucket {{bucketname.name}} in region {{region.name}} has thrown {{value}} 4xx errors over the last 15 mins. AWS account: {{aws_account.name}} 

See [Datadog's S3 dashboard](https://app.datadoghq.com/screen/integration/101/aws-s3?tpl_var_bucketname={{bucketname.name}}) for a historical view on the bucket. 

View in [AWS Console](https://console.aws.amazon.com/s3/buckets/{{bucketname.name}}/?region={{region.name}}&tab=overview)

Consider [enabling access logs for S3](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/ServerLogs.html) if the problem persists.
